name: Crimson Hell
description:
This is my submission to the Bullet Hell Game Jam! Crimson Hell is a shmup set in space where you fight off hordes of demons to save humanity! I will be continuing development on this project and hopefully, it will be released as a full game in the future! I hope you try it out! Feel free to comment with any feedback. 

Hugs and kisses-

Tony (Buffpickle Games)
